testCases.label: Verify page title is customized
testCases.description: Ensures that the loaded page's title is not the default placeholder value, confirming that the HTML document has a meaningful title.

testCases.label: Verify presence of at least one header
testCases.description: Checks that the page contains at least one header element (h1â€“h6), confirming basic semantic structure in the HTML.

testCases.label: Verify unordered list contains list items
testCases.description: Uses a CSS selector to ensure there is at least one <li> element inside a <ul>, confirming that a list structure is present on the page.

testCases.label: Verify link element and target attribute
testCases.description: Verifies that an anchor (<a>) element exists on the page and that its href DOM attribute is set to 'Intro.html'.
